fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Survey (Night): Watch for visitors. You will roleblock all non-Unseen visitors, and attack those who have visited them multiple times.
-Vest (Night): Put on a bulletproof vest and gain basic defense. 2 uses.
-Hunt (Day): Select a player and guess their role. If it is correct, you will roleblock and kill them tonight. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If your Hunt target's role is incorrect, you will lose a charge, but not face any other penalty.
